room_title: Escape room "Night Train 1892 - Jewel Heist" by Grande Royal Escape in Jacksonville
room_description:
You sit comfortably in your first class cabin as you make your way from the frozen streets of NYC to the warm tropics of sunny Saint Augustine, Florida. It is a normal trip for people of your social status but unlike the other well to do tourists riding with you, you are taking this trip for a reason other than sunshine.
You have a job to do, one last job before you can retire as a master jewel thief. The biggest prize you have ever sought, the Peacock Diamonds that are only a couple of walls away. If you can steal those jewels and disappear into the night not only will you be rich, you will be legendary. As your father always said, "Fame outshines riches."
